scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.dev:install: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ver = (Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; npm run package; if ($LASTEXITCODE -eq 0) { code --install-extension ./breath-master-$ver.vsix }"
scripts.version:patch: npm version patch && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:minor: npm version minor && git push && git push --tags
scripts.version:major: npm version major && git push && git push --tags
scripts.release:patch: npm run test && npm run version:patch && npm run package && npm run publish
scripts.release:minor: npm run test && npm run version:minor && npm run package && npm run publish
scripts.release:major: npm run test && npm run version:major && npm run package && npm run publish
scripts.tag:current: powershell -NoProfile -Command "$ver = (Get-Content package.json | ConvertFrom-Json).version; git tag v$ver; git push origin v$ver"
